RuleContent[2]:
1. You will get 1 attempt to launch fireworks (Pew Pew) with daily first log-in. 
2. When launching a firework, its pattern will be randomly selected among three types.
3. Commandant will receive different rewards according to the pattern of the firework you launched.
4. Please note that the attempt cannot be accumulated and will be reset every day.
RuleContent[3]:
Rewards contain the following two parts:
1. Guaranteed rewards: Black Card *30
2. Random rewards: will be changed according to the fireworks pattern.

※[Pattern I]Colorful fireworks bloom in the sky. 
Chance: 30%
Randomly get one of the following rewards: Serum *60ml, Minor Overclock Alloy *3, Memory Overclock Circuit I *3,
Weapon Overclock Core I *3, Cogs *50000

※[Pattern II] Tricolor fireworks light up the night.
Chance: 50%
Randomly get one of the following rewards: Serum *30ml, Minor Overclock Alloy *2, Memory Overclock Circuit I *2, 
Weapon Overclock Core I *2, Cogs *30000

※[Pattern III] Yellow and orange fireworks bring you joy.
Chance: 20%
Randomly get one of the following rewards: Serum *20ml, Minor Overclock Alloy *1, Memory Overclock Circuit I *1, 
Weapon Overclock Core I *1, Cogs *20000
